title: Kiss Kiss
description: alternate cover for ISBN 0140018328If your taste is for the macabre, the sick, the outrageous, the unexpected, the horrifying - Roald Dahl will give you orgiastic delight. If not, you are going to miss one of the most sophisticated collections of short stories in print.Contents:- The Landlady (1959)- William and Mary (1960)- The Way Up to Heaven (1954)- Parson's Pleasure (1958)- Mrs Bixby and the Colonel's Coat (1959)- Royal Jelly (1959)- Georgy Porgy (1959)- Genesis and Catastrophe (1959, variant of A Fine Son)- Edward the Conqueror (1953)- Pig (1959)- The Champion of the World (1959)
author: Roald Dahl
